description:
A pioneer in the Supply Chain IoT industry has an opening for a Vice President of Sales in Northeast Ohio.

This is a senior leadership role with an opportunity to advance even further in the company.

This position offers a very competitive salary, generous bonus incentive, and excellent benefits package.

Some of the Responsibilities of the Vice President of Sales include:
• Responsible for sales as well as custom initiatives and solutions across multiple industries.
• Drive revenue growth by consistently exceeding sales targets, negotiating contracts, and optimizing pricing strategies to maximize profitability while ensuring customer satisfaction.
• Lead, mentor, and motivate a high-performing enterprise sales team, setting clear targets and fostering a culture of collaboration, accountability, and continuous improvement.
• Create and execute innovative sales strategies to identify, engage, and convert enterprise-level prospects into long[1]term customers
• Align the sales organization’s objectives with firm business strategy through active sales strategy development, forecasting, sales resource planning, and budgeting.
• Define optimal performance metrics and performance management programs required to ensure sales organization success and align reporting, training and incentive programs with the same
• Provide clear direct communication to senior leaders and other functional managers to ensure a consistent understanding of business opportunities, resource needs and profitability goals
• Assess and improve upon existing sales processes, methodologies, infrastructure and metrics
• Ensure that all sales opportunities are accurately recorded and maintained in CRM (i.e. Salesforce) to enable accurate monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue forecasts.
• Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and client meetings, enhancing the organization's visibility and credibility within the enterprise market
• Ensure adherence to legal and ethical standards in all sales activities, fostering a culture of integrity and compliance within the sales team

Some of the Qualifications/Requirements of the Vice President of Sales include:
• 10+ years of sales management experience with demonstrated track record of success
• Demonstrated ability to attract, build, mentor and direct a high-performing, cohesive sales team with a track record of meeting or exceeding revenue and growth expectations
• Extensive experience in Enterprise Technology or SaaS Sales
• Highly developed executive presence with strong collaboration skills; able to articulate a value proposition and secure buy-in and support from senior executive leadership, peers, and staff
• Proven ability to scale a sales organization and revenue streams
• Strategic thinker capable of building innovative sales strategy, models with the tactical ability to execute.
• Strong work ethic and ownership of both company and client goals/objectives, focused on understanding, meeting and exceeding customer expectations
• Proven success in selling complex, technical products
• Strong operational execution capabilities combined with strategic thinking
• Superior written and verbal communication skills including executive presentations to the most senior organization levels
